Class Lambertian

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class Lambertian
extends Shader
    A Lambertian material scatters light equally in all directions. BRDF value is a constant

      • shade

        public void shade(Colord outIntensity,
         Scene scene,
         Ray ray,
         IntersectionRecord record)
        Evaluate the intensity for a given intersection using the Lambert shading model.
        Specified by:
        shade in class Shader
        Parameters:
        outIntensity - The color returned towards the source of the incoming ray.
        scene - The scene in which the surface exists.
        ray - The ray which intersected the surface.
        record - The intersection record of where the ray intersected the surface.
        depth - The recursion depth.
